text.data-name: Everyone around you persuaded you to have another child. And you did. This time you were scared that you would have a daughter again. You didn’t want to be the lady who were looked down on by the villagers because she couldn’t have a boy. Fortunately,
text.tspan: This time you were scared that you would have
a daughter again. You didn’t want to be the lady
who were looked down on by the villagers because
Fortunately, the second child is a boy. After the
midwife wiped the baby, your mother–in–law held
him in her arms, wanting to see her grandson.
“Awwww, my little grandson. He looks the same
as his father when he was a kid.”
